text: 🚨 27% of Adults Face At Least One Healthcare Affordability Challenge 💸🤕 New study shows that healthcare financial strain is affecting millions of US families, with low- and middle-income households hit hardest. 🏥👉 High out-of-pocket costs, medical debt, forgone care – the list goes on. 🤷‍♂️ It's time for policymakers to take action and ensure everyone can access affordable healthcare.
